p: Regular Terms of Court. Are Held At Walla Walla- On 2d Monday of May and the 4th Monday of November of each year. Colfax- On the 2d Monday of June and the 2d Monday of December of each year. Pomeroy- on the 3d Monday of March and the 1st Monday of October of each year.
Office of the Clerk of the U.S. Disctrict Court of the First Judicial District of Washington Ter.
In the name of the United States,

You are hereby commanded to bring the body of George Grant before me at chambers at one oclock the 17th of Feb 1888 and there show cause why your what the said George Grant is restrained of his liberty and at said time and place due court.
